title: Group portrait of Golden Gloves Junior Division boxing champions, from left: flyweight Silas Carter, bantam weight Jim Gruber, featherweight Hernie Stein, lightweight Pat Deasy, welterweight Conrad Williams, middleweight Marion Conner, light-heavyweight Tom Gererade, and heavyweight Jim McLeod, wearing satin robes and posed with left fists raised, in Pitt Field House, University of Pittsburgh
medium: black and white: Kodak Safety Film
provenance_text: The Estate of Charles H. Harris, Pittsburgh
